EmailTemplate.name: TriCON 2012.Early Bird Extended - VisiNet
EmailTemplate.subject: TriCON - Early Bird Registration Deadline Extended to August 15
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> Early Bird Extended To August 15 TriTech's Annual User Conference l September 26 - 28, 2012 Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Client}},
By popular demand, we're extending our early-bird rate to August 15. We're giving you four extra weeks to push those approvals through the door. Join us for two-and-a-half exciting days of TriCON: product announcements, industry education, training, networking...and YOU!
Additional resources to support the TriCON approval process:
- TriCON Justification Letter <http://offers.tritech.com/rs/ortivusna/images/TriTech_JustificationLetter.doc> - Agenda Sneak Peek <http://offers.tritech.com/rs/ortivusna/images/Agenda%20Sneak%20Peak_04242012_c.pdf>
- Detail Agenda - COMING SOON!!
See you in San Diego!
<http://offers.tritech.com/rs/ortivusna/images/TriTech_JustificationLetter.doc> Conference Details
Registration: $695 - Early-Bird fee before August 15.
Never been to TriCON? You are eligible for a $50 discount. Select the First Time Attendee fee of $645.
Part of a group of 4 or more or Consortium? Receive an additional $50 discount off your registration fee. Enter the code "Group" to receive the discount.
<http://www.cvent.com/d/vcqlkf/4W>
